tags.name: Partner
tags.description: Main search and access to natural and legal person

tags.name: Addresses
tags.description: Access to all addresses of a partner

tags.name: Contact Information
tags.description: Access to email and phone numbers of a partner

tags.name: Payment Accounts
tags.description: Access to payment accounts of a partner

tags.name: Partner Relations
tags.description: Access to all partner to partner relations

tags.name: Contact Documents
tags.description: Access to contact document history elements and attachments

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Flag if natural or legal persons must be searched. Leave empty for license place, policy number or claims number search.

parameters.name: postCode
parameters.description: Valid post code of the customer's current residence.

parameters.name: town
parameters.description: Name of the town of the customer's current residence.

parameters.name: licensePlate
parameters.description: License plate of the partner's car.

parameters.name: firstname
parameters.description: First name filter attribute. Only applicable if type = NATURAL_PERSON.

parameters.name: lastname
parameters.description: Last name filter attribute. Only applicable if type = NATURAL_PERSON.

parameters.name: birthdate
parameters.description: Date of birth of the customer. Only applicable if type = NATURAL_PERSON.

parameters.name: socialSecurityNumber
parameters.description: Valid CH or LI social security number or old format of AHV number, optional with . as separator.

parameters.name: companyName
parameters.description: Filter attribute. Only applicable if type = LEGAL_PERSON.

4XX.description: Client error, e.g. bad request, unauthorized, etc.

5XX.description: Server error, e.g. internal server error.

get.description: Read list of partners matching to the filter attributes. NOTE: For NATURAL_PERSON either licensePlate, policy number, claims number or a combincation of firstname, lastname and postCode/town is mandatory. For LEGAL_PERSON either license plate, policy number, claims number or a combination of companyName and postCode/town is mandatory.

4XX.description: Client error, e.g. bad request, unauthorized, etc.

5XX.description: Server error, e.g. internal server error.

parameters.name: partnerRelationsAt
parameters.description: relations in response can be filtered by a cut-off date. If empty the current day is used

parameters.name: addressesAt
parameters.description: addresses in response can be filtered by a cut-off date. If empty the current day is used

parameters.name: _expand
parameters.description: Response can be expanded to contain additional sub-resources

schema.description: List of sub-resources to be expanded, separated by , possible values: /contactInformationPreference,/addresses, /partnerRelations, /paymentAccounts

4XX.description: Client error, e.g. bad request, unauthorized, etc.

5XX.description: Server error, e.g. internal server error.

get.description: Read all details of a partner. With the query parameter _expand it is possible to get aggregated data from this partner.

parameters.description: addresses in response can be filtered by a cut-off date. If empty the current day is used

parameters.name: addressId
parameters.description: ID of the address of the partner

4XX.description: Client error, e.g. bad request, unauthorized, etc. or valid from is not identical as the old address

5XX.description: Server error, e.g. internal server error.

put.description:
Modifies an existing address of an existing partner. 
- The valid-from date must be identical as the old address.
- you can leave it empty and it will use automatically the old address valid-from date. 
Special case address type is PRIMARY: 
- you can only modify a future address that was already created.
- if you want to adapt the current one and not the future one, you need to delete the future one fist and recreate it.
Tip: If your valid-from must be different, use the POST operation for a move for a PRIMARY address.

parameters.name: addressId
parameters.description: ID of the address of the partner

4XX.description: Client error, e.g. bad request, unauthorized, etc. or valid from must be different than the old one.

5XX.description: Server error, e.g. internal server error.

post.summary: move partner to a new address
post.description:
Move an existing partner to a new address location.  
A new address will be created, including a new id and the old address will be terminated (valid to).
This is only supported for addresses of type PRIMARY.
The valid from date must different than the old address or will be set automatically to actual date, if empty.
If new valid from must be always later than the old valid from.
If you want to modify (=correct) an address use the PUT operation.

parameters.name: addressId
parameters.description: ID of the address of the partner

delete.description: Delete an address of an existing partner. Delete for PRIMARY can only be done for a future address not for the current

get.description: Read contact information of a partner

409.description:
Conflict - The request could not be completed due to a conflict with the current state of the resource.
One special case: ZXBPL3ODT/031 - Partner with id 'id' is locked and cannot be updated. Retry

423.description:
Locked - The resource that is being accessed is locked.
One special case: ZXBPL3ODT/031 - Partner with id 'id' is locked and cannot be updated. 
A user is editing the partner at this moment and no UPDATES are possible. Please try again later or queue the update.

4XX.description: Client error, e.g. bad request, unauthorized, etc.

5XX.description: Server error, e.g. internal server error.
